review: The fire stick is easy to use.  There are a lot of options with all the games, movies, tv shows, etc.  The negatives are that a lot of the tv shows and movies are Pay Per View so that would quickly bring the $99/year you pay for Amazon Prime up.  We couldn't figure out how to use it on a different tv so I'm not sure that's possible.  Also, there was so much buffering that we cancelled it during our free trial.
